metadata.title: CVE-2024-34155 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Calling any of the Parse functions on Go source code which contains deeplynested literals can cause a panic due to stack exhaustion.

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
